description: Monitor for SMB traffic on TCP ports 139, 445 and UDP port 137 and WebDAV traffic attempting to exit the network to unknown external systems.If attempts are detected, then investigate endpoint data sources to find the root cause. Analytic 1 - Unusual network traffic patterns indicative of forced authentication attempts. index=network sourcetype="stream:tcp" (dest_port=445 OR dest_port=80 OR dest_port=443) | eval Protocol=case(dest_port==445, "SMB", dest_port==80, "HTTP", dest_port==443, "HTTPS", true(), "Unknown") | eval SuspiciousConn=if((Protocol="SMB" AND src_ip!=dest_ip AND (src_ip!="known_ip1" AND dest_ip!="known_ip2")), 1, 0) | where SuspiciousConn=1
